name: Md shahidul Islam
description: The materials isn't good. Sound quality good but if it slip from hand it will be gone

name: Md Mahin
description: used this not more than 10 days, but I think IN SHA ALLAH I will face no problem with this product.If anyone want to buy any headphone under 550, I would recommend this.

name: Md Emran Mhamod
description: I really loved the headset, pure gamming headset which sound almost 7.1 surrounded without the driver of virtual surrounding. Its a BEAST in this budget range, also the online support of startech done such a good job with the order process.

name: Munem Shariar
description: Very good headset, lightweight, comfortable with leather and memory foam. Although plastic build and doesn't feel like a tank but the headset still feels premium. Mic is very good. It has 7.1 which is a plus point. Audio isn't the best in the world but with a bit of tuning it'll be good.

name: Md Montasir chowdhury
description: It is good .I am using it. It comforts my ear.

name: Ishtiaq udin
description: Good mic quality, but I am a bit disappointed with the sound quality, could have been better, but hey it's still pretty good for it's price range.
